sentences.en: A vintage bergere chair has been infused with a fresh new vitality with some glossy raspberry paint and animal print upholstery, adding playful yet sophisticated style to this teen girl's room.
sentences.cn: 一款古典的扶手椅被漆上了漂亮的红色油漆，并且用动物斑纹来装饰，给这个女孩房增添了生动的色彩。

trans.tran_cn: 围手椅（尤指18世纪法国式藤条椅子）
